definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: But leaving this physiological view, let us look at the purely educational .
sentences.chinese: 且不論這生理學上的問題，我們單從教育方面來看。

sentences.english: Thus, neurophysiologists tell us that lobsters do not process pain.
sentences.chinese: 但是，神經生理學家告訴我們龍蝦感知不到疼痛。

sentences.english: A functional spinal unit (FSU) is the smallest physiological motion unit of the …
sentences.chinese: 脊柱功能單位是脊柱的最小生理學運動單位。

sentences.english: Astragalus polysaccharides was provided by Shanghai Institute of Physiology of Academia Sinica.
sentences.chinese: 黃芪多糖由原中國科學院上海生理學研究所提供。

sentences.english: He was honoured with the Nobel prize for medicine in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 他曾獲2002年度諾貝爾生理學或醫學獎。

sentences.english: He was awarded the Nobel Prize for achievements in physiology.
sentences.chinese: 他因生理學方面的成就而被授予諾貝爾獎。

sentences.english: He was awarded the Nobel Prize for achievements in physiology.
sentences.chinese: 他因生理學方面的建樹而被授予諾貝爾獎。

sentences.english: That change in water temperature has lowered a physiological barrier that has kept the crabs in check.
sentences.chinese: 水溫的這一變化使控制蟹類的生理學屏障削弱了。

sentences.english: This is the homepage of International Journal of Psychophysiology.
sentences.chinese: 這是《國際心理生理學雜誌》的主頁。

sentences.english: The answers, some exercise physiologists say, are not always what you might expect.
sentences.chinese: 一些運動生理學家的答案並非如你所想。

sentences.english: The work was published in the journal Plant Physiology.
sentences.chinese: 這份報告在《植物生理學》雜誌上發表。

sentences.english: I thellonk, first of all, an excellent combination of advertising and psychological needs.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，起首，優異的告白需要以及生理學聯合。

sentences.english: Find a neurologist who specializes in the neurophysiology of hyperhidrosis.
sentences.chinese: 建議找個對多汗症有研究的，神經生理學方面的專家。

sentences.english: Yet profound exploration of human physiology remained elusive.
sentences.chinese: 然而對人體生理學的深入探索仍難以實現。

sentences.english: There are some tricks, exercise physiologists say, but also some risks.
sentences.chinese: 運動生理學家指出，其中有些訣竅，但也有些風險。

definition: to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
hard power (i.e. military and economic power)
